options.text: What happened to the last recruit?

dialouge: Hello [@], it says here on my sheet that you are the new recruit eh?`Well lets hope you fare better than the last one...`Anyway, here is your entry level gear, and the 'B{General}' wants to speak with you right away, he is in the camp directly 'Y{south}' of here.

options.text: What happened to the last recruit?
Do you know anything about a store handle?

dialouge: I am the Mighty Dockyard Guard! I watch over any and all trading!
Ummm, well he uhhh, you know what? You should just ask the 'B{General}'...
Excuse me? Oh the one B{Jodie} is missing.`No I do not know who has it`But I keep a watchful eye over this dock, so if I find it I will inform B{Jodie} right away.
Well hello there young one! What brings you to the inn?
Not much, just looking around. Who are you?
Oh ho ho, right to the point eh? I am Frank, leader of this fine Inn.

options.text: I will be back as soon as I can

dialouge: I am trying to make some soup for my husband, but it just does not taste right.
Hmm, do you think you could get me some ingredients?
Yes! I think I could, what ingredients do you want?

If you could grab me a B{Foxnose} plant that would be terrific. There is sometimes a G{Shady Trader} that comes to visit the Y{Town Square} that carries them. You will need some stars to get some from him, but I would think B{15 stars} should be enough.
What are you doing here? Quite a question indeed, but one I have no answer too.`I apologize young one, but you will have to seek knowlage somewhere else.
You are quite welcome, now, what else can I help you with?
Take your time, again I really appreciate this.

options.text: Do you know anything about a store handle?

dialouge: Thank you very much for helping me out with that soup, it means quite a lot to me.

options: quest('z1.innkeeper.stew') in [1, 0] and not has('foxnose') or not has('goat-meat')

options.text: Do you know anything about a store handle?

dialouge: Did you find my ingredients yet?
Thank you so much young one!`I must say you are a rather helpful helper. Would you do one more favor for me?

My stew is a bit bland right now, do you think you could find some G{Goat Meat} to help spice it up? It used to be sold in the Y{Camp Store}, but I am afraid they do not sell it anymore. Hmm, I did hear B{Jodie} mention something about a Y{Shead} by the Y{Camp Store}, maybe you could check there?

options.text: You", "Oh, alright. Um, yea, I will um, get on that. Yea, ok

dialouge: No, yes, kind of. If someone catches you, just send them to me.
Frank flexes and his 6 foot 5 frame almost doubles in size
You found some! Thank you very much, this is the perfect thing for my soup!
Now if you wait just a moment...`A little longer...`...`...`YES!`My stew is finaly done, time to tell Fred.`FRE-ED!
Huh? Did you call me Frank?
Yes! This young travler helped me make my famous stew!
Mmm, that is good stew, thank you...`I'm sorry, but what was your name?
My name is [@], I'm the new recruit here.
I see! Well, thank you for helping my husband with his stew.`Between you and me, he is not the best cook.
Kidding, kidding.`I almost forgot, here is a few B{stars}, hopefully these will help on your training.
A handle. One made for a store cupboard?
I am sorry, but I do not know know.`That sounds like something someone Y{shady} would take though.

z1-campinn.name: Inn Keeper
observation: The inn keeper is stirring a massive pot of soup in the corner

dialouge: Yea? Who are you and what do you want?
My name is [@], who are you?
[@] huh? Interesting name.`All you need to know is that I am a trader of wares. Some legal... some not, all of which cost G{stars}.

options.text: Do you know about a store handle?

dialouge: Yeaaaaa, sorry. G{Foxnose} is a crisp 10 stars. No stars, no G{foxnose}. Thats how it works around here kid.
Foxnose eh? That will be B{10 stars}
A handle. One made for a store cupboard?
Hmph, fine.`A nice 15 stars would make sure I tell you the right information...
Hm, thank you. Here is your G{store handle}.
You stole this dident you? I should report you to the G{General} right now.
I have no idea what you are talking about, but I will not take accusations. Please be on your way.
Come back later, I do not work for free.

z1-campcenter.name: Shady Trader
observation: A shady trader watches you from a distance

options.text: Do you know what happened to it?
Do you want help getting it back?

dialouge: Hello, what do you have for sale?
All kinds of stuff, or at least we used to.
This morning when I opened, the handle to our inventory closet was gone, and I cannot unlock the closet without the handle.

options.text: Do you want help getting it back?

dialouge: No, but I think someone stole it.
Yes, the lock on the door was picked and the door was open this morning. Nothing else was stolen, just the handle.

options.text: How do you know my name?

dialouge: Of course, just give me a bit to look around.
She sticks out her hand and gives you a handshake
I am Jodie by the way, it is good to meet you [@]
Word get around quick you know, you are the new recruit right?
You know what would be a great first 'mission'?`Finding my handle, what do you say?
That's great, thank you very much.
Do you have any idea who took it?
No, but it must have been someone B{shady}...
Do you have my handle yet?
Thank the elements, I can finally open my store again!
You are welcome.`So what do you sell?
All kinds of stuff, here, take some stars then come around to the front of counter and talk to me again.
Ok, I will keep holding down the fort here.

z1-campstore.name: Shop Owner
observation: The store owner sits in a chair behind the counter, looking rather board
The store owner is standing behind the counter
